channel.title: Tormented Angels - 474
channel.description:
[center][B]Tormented Angels is a 474 server, Founded by Dylan, and Developed by Dylan, Oswald, and Chris.[/B]
Our goal and mission is to create an attractive, yet challenging server for everyone to enjoy. The Server has just been released. We currently have a Membership system, though the system may change in the future.
[B]We have a new, never-before-seen Background, which Chris created:[/B] [IMG]http://i806.photobucket.com/albums/yy345/xxskinney13x/NewClient.png[/img]
We, at Tormented Angels, decided to create a full expansion of the world map. Most of the cities are fully working, as well as shops, mini-games, bosses, and more! We also have a working clan chat, teleport tabs, working Turmoil, Lunars, and Ancients.
We have [B]Dragon Claws[/B], fully functional PvP [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2zf0lsk.png[/img]
[B]21 Working Skills![/B] [IMG]http://i806.photobucket.com/albums/yy345/xxskinney13x/Stats.jpg[/img]
[B]Home area right next to Catherby for all your skilling needs![/B]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/5mzbc.png[/img]
[B]Working Turmoil[/B] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/24ev1hg.png[/img]
[b]Other Features[/b] KBD Custom Bosses including Elvarg, Ice queen, and the vampire Dessous Kalph Skills all working Full Barrows Dag Kings Jad Duel Multi Area Lv 12 Wildy Pk Mage Bank Fight Pits West Pk East Pk Edgeville Almost all towns have NPC spawns
You can join the forums here: [url=http://www.tormentedangels.smfnew.com/index.php]Tormented Angels - Index[/url] You can play the web client here: [url=http://www.tormentedangels.com/webclient.html]Webclient[/url]
We have updated the server as much as we can, and to the best of our ability. If something happens to go wrong, or a bug is accidentally implemented, it will be fixed as soon as possible.
We hope you join, and stay tuned for the greatness that will come out of this new, and thriving server! Happy gaming![/center]

item.title: Tormented Angels - 474
item.dc:creator: @callmedragon callmedragon
item.description:
@callmedragon wrote:

[center]Tormented Angels is a 474 server, Founded by Dylan, and Developed by Dylan,
Oswald, and Chris.

Our goal and mission is to create an attractive, yet challenging server for everyone to enjoy.
The Server has just been released.
We currently have a Membership system, though the system may change in the future.

We have a new, never-before-seen Background, which Chris created:

NewClient.png778×537

We, at Tormented Angels, decided to create a full expansion of the world map.
Most of the cities are fully working, as well as shops, mini-games, bosses, and more!
We also have a working clan chat, teleport tabs, working Turmoil, Lunars, and Ancients.

We have Dragon Claws, fully functional PvP

2zf0lsk.png760×499

21 Working Skills!

Home area right next to Catherby for all your skilling needs!

5mzbc.png760×499

Working Turmoil

24ev1hg.png760×499

Other Features
KBD
Custom Bosses including Elvarg, Ice queen, and the vampire Dessous
Kalph
Skills all working
Full Barrows
Dag Kings
Jad
Duel
Multi Area Lv 12 Wildy Pk
Mage Bank
Fight Pits
West Pk
East Pk
Edgeville
Almost all towns have NPC spawns

You can join the forums here: Tormented Angels - Index
You can play the web client here: Webclient

We have updated the server as much as we can, and to the best of our ability.
If something happens to go wrong, or a bug is accidentally implemented, it will be fixed as soon as possible.

We hope you join, and stay tuned for the greatness that will come out of this new, and thriving server!
Happy gaming![/center]
